lender.occupational_info: I live with my husband on acreage, we live a very good life, have 4 grown children, 1 grandchild. We love to garden and be in nature.

lender.name: Lynn

lender.occupational_info: I have two small business's to help me support my own girls.

lender.loan_because: Sacrifice brings forth the blessings of heaven. Plus - God gave to me so I should def share.
lender.occupational_info: I am working towards being an instructor.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I thought it would be a good way to help someone that wants to help themselves and there family.I wish the best of luck to you and your business.Have a nice day.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single, Electrician ,work on lots of different construcion sites around the USA.My farther was a Electrician and he was a good man,It served his family well.People are allways going to need electricity.I live on my boat with Lucy my dog and we sail around pugent sound washington going to different islands.Trying to enjoy life.

lender.name: Jette
lender.loan_because: Some people have too much money others none - I´m hoping to slightly change it!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to attract and retain coworkers - via ads, ideas and events.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I care deeply that someone out there isn't struggling and that my small contribution will make a difference.

lender.name: Braxton
lender.loan_because: I believe in reciprocity and diversity. Autonomy and equanimity flourish within the goodwill of humankind (the opposite of greed) will enable the re-distribution of wealth in the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with plants, people, and places. I look for connections, surpluses, and needs in relationships between these elements. I make compost whenever and wherever possible. I grow crops, harvest them, and prepare fresh food for my coworkers. I work for a small wood products company that manufacturers raised bed gardening kits. I give advice about gardening and landscape designs to customers and build and test products in demonstration gardens. I also help others care for forested properties. No matter who is my client Mother Earth is always the boss!

lender.name: rob
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to directly help people who want to make a difference them selves. And in their turn can possibly make a change for other people in their surrounding.
lender.occupational_info: I live in the Netherlands, a very smal country in Europe, i am married and have 2 children. for my work i transport people from one place to another.

lender.name: Kathrine

lender.occupational_info: my work focuses on working with indigenous and non indigenous groups to protect the cultural and natural heritage of special conservation areas of land in Australia

lender.name: Petr

lender.name: Gail Barnum
lender.loan_because: God has been so good to me. I have been blessed in more ways than I can count. Even in the times when I could see only pain and heartache, many blessings and rewards I would have never experienced have come as a result of tough times.
lender.occupational_info: For over 20 years I have been a Registered Nurse in the hospital, caring for sick and premature infants, surgery patients and Emergency Room Patients. lender.occupational_info: I am a Commercial Designer, I design commercial facilities, I help customers pick out paint colors, tiles, cabinets, furniture, artwork, etc, I design the space showing how the room would look finished, this is called space planning, I love my job and I am so thankful to be able to help others....

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to see people reach their potential, and sometimes they need a little help from people who care.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a single divorced mother of a young daughter. I work full time, try to keep up with our pack of 3 dogs and 4 cats (sigh), play the piano, and love video games.

lender.name: FMP Kiva Team
lender.occupational_info:
FMP is a strategic consulting firm dedicated to nothing less than improving the effectiveness of the federal government. As a small business since 1991, we have specialized in helping agencies strategically manage their human capital and enhance the performance of their public missions. The FMP Way means working shoulder-to-shoulder with our Federal clients to understand their unique challenges and to develop practical, effective solutions. We are dedicated to the highest standards of integrity, excellence, and client service.
Our objective in each consulting engagement is to exceed your expectations, earn your trust, and use that trust to significantly impact the performance of your organization.

lender.loan_because: The horrible oppression of women and children in this world moves me to want to help them and this seems like a great way to do that.

lender.name: Valerie

They need to be given a chance to achieve their dreams and maybe, in time, improve the their own lives and the lives of the people in their communities. If the very least I can do is to send a little of my shopping money, than I am beginning to do my part. There is so much more I can do - but this is where I start.

lender.name: Jan and John

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I am in a position to help and people out there deserve it. I live in a time and place that I find myself surrounded by human selfishness. There are days I feel it best to just give up on people. It's humbling to realize that a place like Kiva exists. I want to spread the word. Kiva showed me the reality that there are other people who WANT to help and has given me the first sign of hope I've seen in years.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to pursue their goals
lender.occupational_info: I make sure numbers are right

lender.name: Angela Turnbull
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at some point in their life. Being able to pay these loans back is the key to this working. These people can keep their integrity and be proud of their own achievements. It works better than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I work in film. Television commercials. I decorate the sets that we film.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves :)

lender.name: JuJu
lender.loan_because: i believe in random acts of kindness and senseless beauty...

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I love giving others the tools they need to springboard themselves into success. It's so exciting to see repayments as they are made because it's a sign that the entrepreneur is doing well. And when the initial loan is all paid back, a new entrepreneur will receive the tools to start growing. The whole cycle is very rewarding and exciting.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Economies are built by people borrowing to grow their businesses.

lender.name: Caitlyn
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help as many people in the world, with an admirable goal and a dream worth living, as I can--this is just one way that I can help people realize their own personal strength and successes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university

lender.name: KCS Grad Class 2010
lender.loan_because: We want to leave a legacy from our class that will last for the future
lender.occupational_info: High school graduating students

lender.name: Ollie
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone get off the ground and build a better life for themselves and thier family.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in philanthropic sector in Australia with a focus on Higher Education

lender.name: Seongwon
lender.occupational_info: Develop New smartphone in SAMSUNG MOBILE

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed and want to share. I want to help women who can make changesin their lives and the lives of other women in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom who is very interested in working in microfinancing or working for an NGO overseas. I have a grown son who has made some very poor choices in his life and I am unable to help him. So now my passion is to try to make a positive change in other women's lives.. I continue to work everyday to try and help my son make better choices as well.

lender.name: Kinga
lender.loan_because: Because its that easy:))

lender.name: nawid
lender.loan_because: i am a student and i have to go to norway for studying but i need money. that i dont have .i need 16000$ for this trip.
lender.occupational_info: i am student and a student need for money alot. i need for money cause i have to go to norway for studying

lender.name: Queen
lender.loan_because: It's one of my ways of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: Unimportant

lender.name: Murray
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to university students in Australia

lender.name: Tuula
lender.loan_because: Fun!
lender.occupational_info: I would not describe my work in any way. I think my contract would forbid it anyhow?

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: ...why not? I'm a follower of Jesus, and I think of all of the world's resources (money and food, sure, but also encouragement, inspiration, family, etc...) as "God's Economy". As I share what I have, I am provided with what I need, too. My friend, an artist, helped me redecorate my apartment because it was a task that rendered me incompetent. For her, it took about ten minutes to get some ideas, AND she enjoyed it. Later, I cooked for her, something I love to do and do so [fairly] effortlessly; the meal blew her away. We each got something we needed (or wanted) but far more efficiently and joyously than had we tried to get those things on our own. With lending, it is easy for me to loan someone $50 to start a business, whereas starting my own business -something I'd love to do one day- isn't a reality for me right now. Here, I get the benefit of knowing I helped someone with their dream, and it costs me, comparatively, nothing. I am so glad to be able to interact with individuals across the world in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently not employed, but am eagerly waiting for my first baby to make his or her appearance. I'm an American living temporarily in Sweden with my husband, and I spend my time studying to be a doula (a woman that physically and emotionally supports other women during birth) and doing some birth advocacy work. Ever since I was young I've been passionate about equal rights for women, and my eyes are still getting wider as I realize how great the need is to empower women world-wide. I hope to put more time and energy into this in the near future.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to live in a wealthy and prosperous part of the world. I am not a rich individual, but at least I can help somebody else less fortunate than me to grow and prosper in their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I am a coordinator in a purchasing department of a public transmission company (natural gas and electricity). We work to integrate more sustainable energy sources in the electric infrastructure in Denmark. My job is mostly an administrative job, securing communication with our suppliers and coordinating the education and processes of our 30 internal buyers. I work 8-16 monday - friday.

lender.name: Alarna and Megan
lender.loan_because: Our very kind Uncle and Aunty gave us a certificate for Xmas so we can help out people around the world who are less fortunate than ourselves.

lender.name: Bimo & Trie
lender.loan_because: caring other people's life

lender.name: Kevin Magill
lender.loan_because: People have helped me. I now want to help others

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: because i can
